news.title: Consumer prices rose 2.4% annually in January, less than expected
news.summary: The consumer price index was expected to increase 2.5% from a year ago in January, according to the Dow Jones consensus. The Consumer Price Index is a measure of inflation in the United States.

news.title: Dubai's DP World replaces CEO after Epstein links emerge
news.summary: Sultan Ahmed bin Sulayem had been the CEO of Dubai's largest port operator since 2016. He had also been the chairman of Dubai Port Authority since 2007.

news.title: Senate should proceed with Warsh hearings for Fed chair despite Powell probe: Bessent
news.summary: Bessent says he believes Republicans on the Senate Banking Committee "are going to proceed" with a Fed chair nomination hearing for Warsh. Bessent told CNBC's "Squawk Box" he believes the hearing will go ahead.

news.title: Pinterest is down 22% premarket as tariffs hit earnings. Here's what's happening
news.summary: "Many of the largest retailers have been disproportionately impacted by tariffs and have been pulling back on advertising spend," Pinterest's CEO said. Pinterest is a social media app that lets users share photos and videos.

news.title: Trump tariffs leave importers with record-breaking $3.5 billion U.S. Customs bond funding shortfall
news.summary: U.S. Customs identified close to $3.6 billion in surety bond insufficiencies in fiscal 2025. Trade experts say trade experts say has soared due to tariffs.

news.title: ‘At first I laughed.’ More couples are gifting practical things like vacuum cleaners this Valentine’s Day.
news.summary: The idea of gifting something practical for the Feb. 14 holiday appears to be catching on. It may sound decidedly less-than-special, but the idea of gift-gifting is becoming more and more popular.

news.title: It’s been a software horror show.  Here’s why it could get even scarier, according to Citi.
news.summary: A short term bounce may be due for software, but longer term problems remain. The software industry is in a long-term slump, and software is at the heart of it.

news.title: The ‘golden age’ of aero engines is just getting started. These are the stocks to play, says JPMorgan
news.summary: JPMorgan says aero engines is a hot sector and not about to go away. GE Aerospace is among its picks for the sector.

news.title: I’m trying to fix my relationship with my stepdaughter. Should my husband and I tell her how we have divided our assets?
news.summary: “We bought a house outright for $500,000. We each contributed $250,000,” she says. “We each contributed £250,00.”

news.title: ‘We have no prenup’: I want rights of survivorship in our marital home. My wife prefers tenants in common. Now what?
news.summary: “She is an old-school farm girl who inherited all her money and wants to pass it down to her children,” her daughter says.
